attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please STOP this biofuel proposal!!! I have lived in Ferry Road, Eastham with my family and friends for almost 40 years and would like the village to remain a reasonably healthy and safe place to live. We already have the oil refineries on our doorstep, please find another home for the biofuels!!!!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
